hero-info-text: I help businesses grow by creating excellent and efficient web services. If you need a reliable developer who sees projects through to the end and delivers quality results, I'm ready to help.
about-info-p1: My name is Yury and I specialize in web developement that utilizes
about-info-p2: I am a Frontend Developer with a passion for creating intuitive and functional web applications. From April 2022 to June 2024, I worked on a project to develop an analytical service with a large volume of data, where I was the sole Frontend Developer responsible for creating the user interface. I demonstrated initiative and self-organization, successfully tackling complex tasks and enhancing the user experience.
about-info-p3: I am communicative, organized, and team-oriented, with a strong desire to develop and grow professionally. I take responsibility seriously, approach problems with a solution-focused mindset, and quickly adapt to new situations. My attention to detail helps me work thoroughly and accurately.
about-info-p4: I like to have my perspective and belief systems challenged so that I see the world through new eyes.
